items.name: Veg Kolhapuri
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked in onion & tomato based gravy with fresh spices topped with petals of onion, tomato and fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Railway Lamb Curry
items.description: Slow-cooked lamb with a blend of aromatic spices, tomatoes, and coconut milk. The result is a rich and hearty curry that gained popularity as a staple on Indian train journeys.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Railway Style Cutlet
items.description: A nostalgic treat made of deep fried spicy potato. It's a perfect texure of soft potato filling with a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney (4 cutlets)

items.name: Khandeshi Kichidi
items.description: A flavorful rice and lentil dish from Maharashtra, spiced with traditional Khandeshi masalas. It's a hearty and comforting meal with bold, rustic flavors.

items.name: Malai Kofta
items.description: A curried vegetarian dish with crispy fired balls made of potato & paneer in a creamy, smooth, rich sauce
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.description: Marinated and grilled chicken pieces (chicken tikka) are tossed in a creamy and spiced tomato-based curry (masala). This classic fusion dish is known for its rich, savory taste, combining the smokiness of the tandoori-cooked chicken with the lusciousness of the creamy tomato based sauce.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Papadi Chaat
items.description: A popular street food of India. Mini puris topped with mashed potato, onion, tomato, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy tamarind chutney, lots of sev and fresh coriander. A dish with a flavour bomb!

items.name: Kadhi Chawal
items.description: Kadhi is a yogurt based gravy typically made with a mixture of yogurt, besan (gram flour), and spices. Served with chawal (rice).

items.name: Veg Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice, chicken and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy.

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki Chaat
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and topped with a mix of spicy green chutney, sweet & tangy tamarind chutney, yoghurt, pommogranate seeds and sev. (2 tikkis)

items.name: Mix Veg Upma
items.description: A popular South Indian breakfast dish made from semolina (rava) cooked with a variety of vegetables and seasoned with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and spices.

items.name: HolidayðŸ§³
items.description: I'm on holiday until the 24th.

items.name: Bindi Sol
items.description: A traditional Goan dish made from okra (bhindi) cooked in a tangy and mildly spiced kokum (sol) curry. The kokum, gives the dish its sour flavor, is a key ingredient in Goan cuisine, and when paired with okra, it creates a refreshing and light vegetarian curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Prawns Caldine
items.description: A mild, flavorful Goan curry made with prawns cooked in a coconut milk-based sauce. The curry is gently spiced with turmeric, cumin, coriander, green chilies, and aromatics, resulting in a creamy, slightly tangy dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Prawn RissÃ³is
items.description: A popular Goan snack with Portuguese origins. These are crispy, bite-sized pastries filled with a creamy prawn mixture, coated in breadcrumbs, and deep-fried to golden perfection.

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comforting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Pudina Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish from North India. It is made with long-grain basmati rice cooked with a blend of aromatic spices and fresh mint leaves to create a refreshing and delicious flavor.

items.name: Chicken Yakhni Pulao
items.description: Long grain basmati rice cooked in flavourful chicken broth with whole spices, caramalised onion, garlic and ginger topped with fresh coriander. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Paneer Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that is coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to crispy perfection.

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Kerala Veg Thali
items.description: A vibrant array of vegetarian dishes from Kerala in one meal! Featuring some authentic & classic dishes: veg korma, sambar, cabbage thoran & cucumber pachadi accompanied by fluffy rice, 1 parotta (flaky flat bread), crispy papadum and pickle. This thali embodies the diverse and delicious vegetarian cuisine of Kerala.

items.name: Kerala Non-Veg Thali
items.description: A traditional meal platter from Kerala. The thali includes: Varutharacha Nadan Chicken Curry, Chicken Fry, beetroot pachadi accompanied by fluffy rice, 1 parotta (flaky flat bread), crispy papadum & achar.
items.extra: Get traditional beef curry and beef fry instead of chicken.

items.name: Varutharacha Nadan Chicken Curry
items.description: A traditional Kerala style chicken curry made with roasted coconut and spices, creating a rich, flavorful gravy. It's known for its deep, earthy taste. Served with 2 parotta (flaky flat bread).
items.extra: Get beef curry instead of chicken

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad
